thread.title: Suspected car thief shot in Joburg police chase
thread.title_full: Suspected car thief shot in Joburg police chase | News24

author: news24.com
title: Suspected car thief shot in Joburg police chase
text:
Johannesburg â€“ A suspected car thief was shot as police chased after a vehicle to Campus Square shopping centre on Saturday morning.
He was one of the three arrested for allegedly stealing the car in Killarney, said Lieutenant Colonel Lungelo Dlamini.
An area was cordoned off in the basement parking at the back of the mall.
The front of the silver VW was parked on a pile of rubble.
